bullets: Architected and led the migration of a monolithic payment system to microservices using Go and gRPC, improving system scalability to handle 50k requests/second
Designed a multi-region disaster recovery strategy on AWS, reducing Recovery Time Objective (RTO) from 4 hours to 15 minutes
Mentored 4 junior engineers through code reviews and design sessions, resulting in 2 promotions within the team
Optimized database queries and indexing strategies in PostgreSQL, cutting average query latency by 60%
Built a real-time fraud detection service processing $10M+ in daily transactions with <50ms latency
Implemented a robust event-driven architecture using Apache Kafka to decouple services and improve reliability
Led the initiative to containerize all backend services using Docker and Kubernetes, reducing deployment time by 70%
Developed high-performance REST APIs for a video streaming platform serving 1M+ active users
Integrated third-party payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) ensuring PCI-DSS compliance

projects.title: Distributed Key-Value Store
projects.description: Implemented a distributed key-value store from scratch supporting strong consistency and partition tolerance using the Raft consensus algorithm.
bullets: Implemented distributed key-value store with Raft consensus algorithm for strong consistency

projects.title: Rate Limiter Library
projects.description: High-throughput distributed rate limiter using token bucket algorithm, widely used across internal company microservices.
bullets: Created high-throughput distributed rate limiter using token bucket algorithm
